item.title: Formatting Code in VScode
item.description: Why? I used to (and still do) refer to a lot of documentation and code samples, there’s one thing that is common in all of them, every single one of them is formatted as per some rule (such as PEP8 for python) that gives it a consistent look and feel, this makes it easier to read logic of the code instead of getting distracted with the styling of syntax.
